attributes.action: Make those claiming certain benefits do community service.
attributes.additional_details: The UK is allowing people to sponge off the system simply because they do not want to work. Minus those with disabilities etc, I believe that anyone able bodied claiming benefits should be made to do community service. The country is giving handouts to lazy people and they will never get a job knowing they can just take tax payers money.
attributes.background: Those on benefits who are able bodied should be made to do community service. If they are claiming money for unemployment then they should have to at least give something back to the country they are taking tax payers money from.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign 'Set up a community service scheme for benefit claimants who are not in work': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640672
